name: 2fvidinvd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

-| wi(w0, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cv(s1))))

|- wi(w0, wceq(ccnv(c0), c1))

-| wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c1, c0), cres(cid, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cres(cid, c3)))

comment: Show that two functions are inverse to each other by applying them twice to each value of their domains. (Contributed by AV, 13-Dec-2019.)
